Uses of Class
jakarta.xml.ws.WebServiceFeature

Packages that use WebServiceFeature
Package
Description
jakarta.xml.ws
This package contains the core Jakarta XML Web Services APIs.
jakarta.xml.ws.soap
This package defines APIs specific to the SOAP binding.
jakarta.xml.ws.spi
This package defines SPIs for Jakarta XML Web Services.

  • Uses of WebServiceFeature in jakarta.xml.ws.soap

    Subclasses of WebServiceFeature in jakarta.xml.ws.soap
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    AddressingFeature
    AddressingFeature represents the use of WS-Addressing with either the SOAP 1.1/HTTP or SOAP 1.2/HTTP binding.
    final class 
    MTOMFeature
    This feature represents the use of MTOM with a web service.
